StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCollegeList]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ZipCodes xml =null
AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
IF @ZipCodes IS NOT null BEGIN DECLARE @ZipCodesTable TABLE (ID varchar(5)) INSERT INTO @ZipCodesTable (ID) SELECT ParamValues.ID.value('.','VARCHAR(5)') FROM @ZipCodes.nodes('ZipCodes/id') as ParamValues(ID) END
SELECT ROWGUID, SCHOOL_CODE, HIGHSCHOOL_NAME, school_type FROM HIGH_SCHOOL WHERE SCHOOL_TYPE <> 'HS' AND DELETED = 'N' AND ( @ZipCodes is null OR LEFT(ZIP_CODE,5) IN (SELECT * FROM @ZipCodesTable) ) ORDER BY HIGHSCHOOL_NAME ;
END
